articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]

articles.title: Shastri sparks '3D cricketers' debate after Karthik's 'sensitive' comment | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Former Australia cricketer Matthew Hayden hence went on to call Jadeja “three-dimensional cricketer” before being warned by Dinesh Karthik on air that it was a “sensitive topic”, leaving ex-India head coach Ravi Shastri, who was part of the commentary panel, on sticky wicket.
articles.content: Among modern-day all-rounders Ravindra Jadeja has always been the highest-rated among them, across formats. Not just for his abilities with the bat and bowl, which has once again been on display in the ongoing first Test between India and Australia in Nagpur, but also for his terrific fielding. Former Australia cricketer Matthew Hayden hence went on to call him “three-dimensional cricketer” before being warned by Dinesh Karthik on air that it was a “sensitive topic”, leaving ex-India head coach Ravi Shastri, who was part of the commentary panel, on sticky wicket.
